definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized
lit. a brick as a door knocker (idiom); fig. a temporary expedient/to use sb as a stepping stone to fortune
lit. throw out a brick and get jade thrown back (idiom)/fig. to attract others' interest or suggestions by putting forward one's own modest ideas to get the ball rolling
lit. contribute bricks and tiles for a building (idiom)/fig. to do one's bit to help
lit. a brick thrown to prompt others to produce a jade (idiom)/fig. a modest suggestion intended to prompt others to come forward with better ideas
to get the ball rolling (abbr. for 拋磚引玉|抛砖引玉[pao1 zhuan1 yin3 yu4])
to do hard physical labor (as a job)/(fig.) to play mahjong

sentences.english: That is it. So you want high temperature bricks, what are you going to make them out of?
sentences.chinese: 這就是它，因此你想要高溫磚，你打算怎麼做它？

sentences.english: Bright dark cherry red colour with brick- red hints.
sentences.chinese: 略帶磚紅色的明亮深櫻桃紅。

sentences.english: In this paper, a method for calculating seismic vulnerability matrix of brick masonry structure is put forward.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出一種計算磚砌體結構地震易損性矩陣的方法。

sentences.english: He bricked up the hole in the wall.
Press your outer thighs inward, as if squeezing a block between your thighs.
sentences.chinese: 大腿外側往裏側壓，就像大腿之間夾一塊瑜伽磚。

sentences.english: Inner layer is protected by middle and outer layers.
sentences.chinese: 保護其外的中圈和外圈磚。

sentences.english: Shale size brick field produces the shale brick deviation are less than standard requirement.
sentences.chinese: 頁岩磚廠所生產的頁岩磚偏差均小於標準要求。

sentences.english: The small green glazed bricks cover the building's prefabricated concrete structure.
sentences.chinese: 小的綠色琉璃磚覆蓋在建築的預製混凝土結構上。

sentences.english: This paper analyses the grade classifying mechanism of glazed coloured brick in automatic line.
sentences.chinese: 本文對自動線中彩釉磚進行等級分類的機理進行分析。

sentences.english: Whether BioBricks will come to dominate the field remains to be seen.
sentences.chinese: 生物磚是否能夠主宰這個領域還需要繼續觀察。

sentences.english: The invention relates to a self-heat insulation material and a heat-insulation brick for buildings.
sentences.chinese: 本發明涉及一種建築用自保溫材料和保溫磚。

sentences.english: These brick structures help to cast shadows on windows and provide storage nooks.
sentences.chinese: 這些磚結構在窗口投下陰影和爲存儲物品提供空間。

sentences.english: There is a certain relationship between thermal conductivity and density of corkboard.
sentences.chinese: 軟木磚導熱係數與容重間存在着一定的關係。

sentences.english: The facade of the building was checkerboarded with black and white tiles.
sentences.chinese: 建築物的正面用黑白花磚砌成棋盤格圖樣。

sentences.english: Some of the paving stones have even been carved with beautiful Chinese patterns.
sentences.chinese: 有些鋪路石磚甚至刻上了有秀麗的中國書法漢字。

definition: plank bed/place to sleep/shop/store/(old) relay station
to spread/to display/to set up/(old) holder for door-knocker
to build/to construct/to ram/to hit/Taiwan pr. [zhu2]

mark/sign/label/to mark with a symbol, label, lettering etc/to bear (a brand name, registration number etc)/prize/award/bid/target/quota/(old) the topmost branches of a tree/visible symptom/classifier for military units
copper (chemistry)/see also 紅銅|红铜[hong2 tong2]/CL:塊|块[kuai4]
to abolish/to abandon/to abrogate/to discard/to depose/to oust/crippled/abandoned/waste
lump (of earth)/chunk/piece/classifier for pieces of cloth, cake, soap etc/(coll.) classifier for money and currency units

apex/crown of the head/top/roof/most/to carry on the head/to push to the top/to go against/to replace/to substitute/to be subjected to (an aerial bombing, hailstorm etc)/(slang) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/classifier for headwear, hats, veils etc
for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized
